issue.title: [R] Implement TrimOptions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13874](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13874). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement TrimOptions for all of:

utf8_trim_doc
utf8_ltrim_doc
utf8_rtrim_doc
ascii_trim_doc
ascii_ltrim_doc
ascii_rtrim_doc

comments.body:
